data.Name: Straight No Chaser
data.Bio: Straight No Chaser is a men's a cappella group from Indiana University, started in 1996. In 2007, a 1998 video of them singing "The 12 Days of Christmas" went viral and subsequently led to a record deal with Atlantic Records. Straight No Chaser is also a band from San Diego. They have an album, Panoramic. Straight, No Chaser is a hardcore band from Rochester, NY. Straight No Chaser is alias of Chicago House Music producer Johnny Fiasco. Straight No Chaser is also a Rock, Indie band form Kilmore/Wallan, Australia. Read more on Last.fm
